org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkDependencyNode

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependencyNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JkDependencyNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A representation of a node in a dependency tree. A dependency tree may be represented simply by its asScopedDependency node.

See Also:

allFiles

public java.util.List<java.io.File> allFiles()

isModuleNode

public boolean isModuleNode()
Returns true if this node stands for a module dependency. It returns false if it stands for a file dependency.

moduleInfo

public JkDependencyNode.ModuleNodeInfo moduleInfo()
Convenient method to return relative information about this node, assuming this node stands for a module dependency.

Returns:

nodeInfo

public JkDependencyNode.NodeInfo nodeInfo()
Returns information relative to this dependency node.

children

public java.util.List<JkDependencyNode> children()
Returns the children nodes for this node in the tree structure.

contains

public boolean contains(JkModuleId moduleId)
Returns true if this node or one of its descendant stand for the specified module. Evicted nodes are not taken in account.

flattenToVersionProvider

public JkVersionProvider flattenToVersionProvider()
Returns the resolved version for this node and all its flatten.

resolvedModules

public java.util.Set<JkVersionedModule> resolvedModules()
Returns the versioned modules which with this result has been created.

children

public java.util.List<JkDependencyNode> children(JkModuleId moduleId)
Returns the children nodes for this node having the specified moduleId.

child

public JkDependencyNode child(JkModuleId moduleId)
Returns the child node having the specified moduleId.

merge

public JkDependencyNode merge(JkDependencyNode other)
Returns a merge of this dependency node with the specified one. The children of the merged node is a union of the two node children.

flatten

public java.util.List<JkDependencyNode> flatten()
Returns all nodes descendant of this one, deep first.

find

public JkDependencyNode find(JkModuleId moduleId)
Returns first node descendant of this one standing for the specified moduleId, deep first.

toStrings

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> toStrings()
Returns a list of lines standing for the representation of this dependency tree.

Returns a complete representation string of the tree.
